param.name: COMPASS_CAL_FIT
param.documentation: This controls the fitness level required for a successful compass calibration. A lower value makes for a stricter fit (less likely to pass). This is the value used for the primary magnetometer. Other magnetometers get double the value.

param.name: SCHED_DEBUG
param.documentation: Set to non-zero to enable scheduler debug messages. When set to show "Slips" the scheduler will display a message whenever a scheduled task is delayed due to too much CPU load. When set to ShowOverruns the scheduled will display a message whenever a task takes longer than the limit promised in the task table.

param.name: SCHED_LOOP_RATE
param.documentation: This controls the rate of the main control loop in Hz. This should only be changed by developers. This only takes effect on restart

param.name: RCMAP_ROLL
param.documentation: Roll channel number. This is useful when you have a RC transmitter that can't change the channel order easily. Roll is normally on channel 1, but you can move it to any channel with this parameter. Reboot is required for changes to take effect.

param.name: RCMAP_PITCH
param.documentation: Pitch channel number. This is useful when you have a RC transmitter that can't change the channel order easily. Pitch is normally on channel 2, but you can move it to any channel with this parameter. Reboot is required for changes to take effect.

param.name: RCMAP_THROTTLE
param.documentation: Throttle channel number. This is useful when you have a RC transmitter that can't change the channel order easily. Throttle is normally on channel 3, but you can move it to any channel with this parameter. Warning APM 2.X: Changing the throttle channel could produce unexpected fail-safe results if connection between receiver and on-board PPM Encoder is lost. Disabling on-board PPM Encoder is recommended. Reboot is required for changes to take effect.

param.name: RCMAP_YAW
param.documentation: Yaw channel number. This is useful when you have a RC transmitter that can't change the channel order easily. Yaw (also known as rudder) is normally on channel 4, but you can move it to any channel with this parameter. Reboot is required for changes to take effect.

param.name: INS_PRODUCT_ID
param.documentation: Which type of IMU is installed (read-only).

param.name: INS_GYROFFS_X
param.documentation: Gyro sensor offsets of X axis. This is setup on each boot during gyro calibrations

param.name: INS_GYR2OFFS_Z

param.name: INS_GYR3OFFS_Y
param.documentation: Gyro3 sensor offsets of Y axis. This is setup on each boot during gyro calibrations

param.name: INS_GYR3OFFS_Z
param.documentation: Gyro3 sensor offsets of Z axis. This is setup on each boot during gyro calibrations

param.name: INS_ACCSCAL_X
param.documentation: Accelerometer scaling of X axis. Calculated during acceleration calibration routine

param.name: INS_ACCSCAL_Y
param.documentation: Accelerometer scaling of Y axis Calculated during acceleration calibration routine

param.name: INS_ACCSCAL_Z
param.documentation: Accelerometer scaling of Z axis Calculated during acceleration calibration routine

param.name: INS_ACCOFFS_X
param.documentation: Accelerometer offsets of X axis. This is setup using the acceleration calibration or level operations

param.name: INS_ACCOFFS_Y
param.documentation: Accelerometer offsets of Y axis. This is setup using the acceleration calibration or level operations

param.name: INS_ACCOFFS_Z
param.documentation: Accelerometer offsets of Z axis. This is setup using the acceleration calibration or level operations

param.name: INS_ACC2SCAL_X
param.documentation: Accelerometer2 scaling of X axis. Calculated during acceleration calibration routine

param.name: INS_ACC2SCAL_Y

param.name: INS_ACC2SCAL_Z

param.name: INS_ACC2OFFS_X
param.documentation: Accelerometer2 offsets of X axis. This is setup using the acceleration calibration or level operations

param.name: INS_ACC2OFFS_Y
param.documentation: Accelerometer2 offsets of Y axis. This is setup using the acceleration calibration or level operations

param.name: INS_ACC2OFFS_Z

param.name: INS_ACC3OFFS_Z

param.name: INS_GYRO_FILTER
param.documentation: Filter cutoff frequency for gyroscopes. This can be set to a lower value to try to cope with very high vibration levels in aircraft. This option takes effect on the next reboot. A value of zero means no filtering (not recommended!)

param.name: INS_ACCEL_FILTER
param.documentation: Filter cutoff frequency for accelerometers. This can be set to a lower value to try to cope with very high vibration levels in aircraft. This option takes effect on the next reboot. A value of zero means no filtering (not recommended!)

param.humanName: Use first IMU for attitude, velocity and position estimates
param.name: INS_USE
param.documentation: Use first IMU for attitude, velocity and position estimates

param.humanName: Use second IMU for attitude, velocity and position estimates
param.name: INS_USE2
param.documentation: Use second IMU for attitude, velocity and position estimates

param.humanName: Use third IMU for attitude, velocity and position estimates
param.name: INS_USE3
param.documentation: Use third IMU for attitude, velocity and position estimates

param.humanName: Stillness threshold for detecting if we are moving
param.name: INS_STILL_THRESH
param.documentation: Threshold to tolerate vibration to determine if vehicle is motionless. This depends on the frame type and if there is a constant vibration due to motors before launch or after landing. Total motionless is about 0.05. Suggested values: Planes/rover use 0.1, multirotors use 1, tradHeli uses 5

param.name: INS_GYR_CAL
param.documentation: Conrols when automatic gyro calibration is performed

param.name: INS_TRIM_OPTION
param.documentation: Specifies how the accel cal routine determines the trims

values.value: Assume ACC_BODYFIX is perfectly aligned to the vehicle

param.name: INS_ACC_BODYFIX
param.documentation: The body-fixed accelerometer to be used for trim calculation

param.name: AHRS_GPS_GAIN
param.documentation: This controls how how much to use the GPS to correct the attitude. This should never be set to zero for a plane as it would result in the plane losing control in turns. For a plane please use the default value of 1.0.

param.name: AHRS_GPS_USE
param.documentation: This controls whether to use dead-reckoning or GPS based navigation. If set to 0 then the GPS won't be used for navigation, and only dead reckoning will be used. A value of zero should never be used for normal flight.

param.name: AHRS_YAW_P
param.documentation: This controls the weight the compass or GPS has on the heading. A higher value means the heading will track the yaw source (GPS or compass) more rapidly.

param.name: AHRS_RP_P
param.documentation: This controls how fast the accelerometers correct the attitude

param.name: AHRS_WIND_MAX
param.documentation: This sets the maximum allowable difference between ground speed and airspeed. This allows the plane to cope with a failing airspeed sensor. A value of zero means to use the airspeed as is.

param.name: AHRS_TRIM_X
param.documentation: Compensates for the roll angle difference between the control board and the frame. Positive values make the vehicle roll right.

param.name: AHRS_TRIM_Y
param.documentation: Compensates for the pitch angle difference between the control board and the frame. Positive values make the vehicle pitch up/back.

param.name: AHRS_TRIM_Z
param.documentation: Not Used

param.name: AHRS_ORIENTATION
param.documentation: Overall board orientation relative to the standard orientation for the board type. This rotates the IMU and compass readings to allow the board to be oriented in your vehicle at any 90 or 45 degree angle. This option takes affect on next boot. After changing you will need to re-level your vehicle.

param.humanName: AHRS Velocity Complementary Filter Beta Coefficient
param.name: AHRS_COMP_BETA
param.documentation: This controls the time constant for the cross-over frequency used to fuse AHRS (airspeed and heading) and GPS data to estimate ground velocity. Time constant is 0.1/beta. A larger time constant will use GPS data less and a small time constant will use air data less.

param.name: AHRS_GPS_MINSATS
param.documentation: Minimum number of satellites visible to use GPS for velocity based corrections attitude correction. This defaults to 6, which is about the point at which the velocity numbers from a GPS become too unreliable for accurate correction of the accelerometers.

param.humanName: Use NavEKF Kalman filter for attitude and position estimation
param.name: AHRS_EKF_TYPE
param.documentation: This controls whether the NavEKF Kalman filter is used for attitude and position estimation and whether fallback to the DCM algorithm is allowed. Note that on copters "disabled" is not available, and will be the same as "enabled - no fallback"

param.name: ARSPD_ENABLE
param.documentation: enable airspeed sensor

param.name: ARSPD_USE
param.documentation: use airspeed for flight control

param.name: ARSPD_OFFSET
param.documentation: Airspeed calibration offset

param.name: ARSPD_RATIO
param.documentation: Airspeed calibration ratio

param.name: ARSPD_PIN
param.documentation: The analog pin number that the airspeed sensor is connected to. Set this to 0..9 for the APM2 analog pins. Set to 64 on an APM1 for the dedicated airspeed port on the end of the board. Set to 11 on PX4 for the analog airspeed port. Set to 15 on the Pixhawk for the analog airspeed port. Set to 65 on the PX4 or Pixhawk for an EagleTree or MEAS I2C airspeed sensor.

param.name: ARSPD_AUTOCAL
param.documentation: If this is enabled then the APM will automatically adjust the ARSPD_RATIO during flight, based upon an estimation filter using ground speed and true airspeed. The automatic calibration will save the new ratio to EEPROM every 2 minutes if it changes by more than 5%. This option should be enabled for a calibration flight then disabled again when calibration is complete. Leaving it enabled all the time is not recommended.

param.name: ARSPD_TUBE_ORDER
param.documentation: This parameter allows you to control whether the order in which the tubes are attached to your pitot tube matters. If you set this to 0 then the top connector on the sensor needs to be the dynamic pressure. If set to 1 then the bottom connector needs to be the dynamic pressure. If set to 2 (the default) then the airspeed driver will accept either order. The reason you may wish to specify the order is it will allow your airspeed sensor to detect if the aircraft it receiving excessive pressure on the static port, which would otherwise be seen as a positive airspeed.

param.name: ARSPD_SKIP_CAL
param.documentation: This parameter allows you to skip airspeed offset calibration on startup, instead using the offset from the last calibration. This may be desirable if the offset variance between flights for your sensor is low and you want to avoid having to cover the pitot tube on each boot.

param.name: NAVL1_PERIOD
param.documentation: Period in seconds of L1 tracking loop. This parameter is the primary control for agressiveness of turns in auto mode. This needs to be larger for less responsive airframes. The default of 20 is quite conservative, but for most RC aircraft will lead to reasonable flight. For smaller more agile aircraft a value closer to 15 is appropriate, or even as low as 10 for some very agile aircraft. When tuning, change this value in small increments, as a value that is much too small (say 5 or 10 below the right value) can lead to very radical turns, and a risk of stalling.

param.name: NAVL1_DAMPING
param.documentation: Damping ratio for L1 control. Increase this in increments of 0.05 if you are getting overshoot in path tracking. You should not need a value below 0.7 or above 0.85.

param.name: NAVL1_XTRACK_I
param.documentation: Crosstrack error integrator gain. This gain is applied to the crosstrack error to ensure it converges to zero. Set to zero to disable. Smaller values converge slower, higher values will cause crosstrack error oscillation.

param.name: TECS_CLMB_MAX
param.documentation: This is the best climb rate that the aircraft can achieve with the throttle set to THR_MAX and the airspeed set to the default value. For electric aircraft make sure this number can be achieved towards the end of flight when the battery voltage has reduced. The setting of this parameter can be checked by commanding a positive altitude change of 100m in loiter, RTL or guided mode. If the throttle required to climb is close to THR_MAX and the aircraft is maintaining airspeed, then this parameter is set correctly. If the airspeed starts to reduce, then the parameter is set to high, and if the throttle demand require to climb and maintain speed is noticeably less than THR_MAX, then either CLMB_MAX should be increased or THR_MAX reduced.

param.name: TECS_SINK_MIN
param.documentation: This is the sink rate of the aircraft with the throttle set to THR_MIN and the same airspeed as used to measure CLMB_MAX.

param.name: TECS_TIME_CONST
param.documentation: This is the time constant of the TECS control algorithm. Smaller values make it faster to respond, large values make it slower to respond.

param.name: TECS_THR_DAMP
param.documentation: This is the damping gain for the throttle demand loop. Increase to add damping to correct for oscillations in speed and height.

param.name: TECS_INTEG_GAIN
param.documentation: This is the integrator gain on the control loop. Increase to increase the rate at which speed and height offsets are trimmed out

param.name: TECS_VERT_ACC
param.documentation: This is the maximum vertical acceleration either up or down that the controller will use to correct speed or height errors.

param.name: TECS_HGT_OMEGA
param.documentation: This is the cross-over frequency of the complementary filter used to fuse vertical acceleration and baro alt to obtain an estimate of height rate and height.

param.name: TECS_SPD_OMEGA
param.documentation: This is the cross-over frequency of the complementary filter used to fuse longitudinal acceleration and airspeed to obtain a lower noise and lag estimate of airspeed.

param.name: TECS_RLL2THR
param.documentation: Increasing this gain turn increases the amount of throttle that will be used to compensate for the additional drag created by turning. Ideally this should be set to approximately 10 x the extra sink rate in m/s created by a 45 degree bank turn. Increase this gain if the aircraft initially loses energy in turns and reduce if the aircraft initially gains energy in turns. Efficient high aspect-ratio aircraft (eg powered sailplanes) can use a lower value, whereas inefficient low aspect-ratio models (eg delta wings) can use a higher value.

param.name: TECS_SPDWEIGHT
param.documentation: This parameter adjusts the amount of weighting that the pitch control applies to speed vs height errors. Setting it to 0.0 will cause the pitch control to control height and ignore speed errors. This will normally improve height accuracy but give larger airspeed errors. Setting it to 2.0 will cause the pitch control loop to control speed and ignore height errors. This will normally reduce airsped errors, but give larger height errors. A value of 1.0 gives a balanced response and is the default.

param.name: TECS_PTCH_DAMP
param.documentation: This is the damping gain for the pitch demand loop. Increase to add damping to correct for oscillations in speed and height.

param.name: TECS_SINK_MAX
param.documentation: This sets the maximum descent rate that the controller will use. If this value is too large, the aircraft will reach the pitch angle limit first and be unable to achieve the descent rate. This should be set to a value that can be achieved at the lower pitch angle limit.

param.name: TECS_LAND_ARSPD
param.documentation: When performing an autonomus landing, this value is used as the goal airspeed during approach. Note that this parameter is not useful if your platform does not have an airspeed sensor (use TECS_LAND_THR instead). If negative then this value is not used during landing.

param.name: TECS_LAND_THR
param.documentation: Use this parameter instead of LAND_ARSPD if your platform does not have an airspeed sensor. It is the cruise throttle during landing approach. If this value is negative then it is disabled and TECS_LAND_ARSPD is used instead.

param.humanName: Weighting applied to speed control during landing.
param.name: TECS_LAND_SPDWGT
param.documentation: Same as SPDWEIGHT parameter, with the exception that this parameter is applied during landing flight stages. A value closer to 2 will result in the plane ignoring height error during landing and our experience has been that the plane will therefore keep the nose up -- sometimes good for a glider landing (with the side effect that you will likely glide a ways past the landing point). A value closer to 0 results in the plane ignoring speed error -- use caution when lowering the value below 1 -- ignoring speed could result in a stall. Values between 0 and 2 are valid values for a fixed landing weight. When using -1 the weight will be scaled during the landing. At the start of the landing approach it starts with TECS_SPDWEIGHT and scales down to 0 by the time you reach the land point. Example: Halfway down the landing approach you'll effectively have a weight of TECS_SPDWEIGHT/2.

param.name: TECS_PITCH_MAX
param.documentation: This controls maximum pitch up in automatic throttle modes. If this is set to zero then LIM_PITCH_MAX is used instead. The purpose of this parameter is to allow the use of a smaller pitch range when in automatic flight than what is used in FBWA mode.

param.name: TECS_PITCH_MIN
param.documentation: This controls minimum pitch in automatic throttle modes. If this is set to zero then LIM_PITCH_MIN is used instead. The purpose of this parameter is to allow the use of a smaller pitch range when in automatic flight than what is used in FBWA mode. Note that TECS_PITCH_MIN should be a negative number.

param.humanName: Sink rate for final landing stage
param.name: TECS_LAND_SINK
param.documentation: The sink rate in meters/second for the final stage of landing.

param.name: TECS_LAND_TCONST
param.documentation: This is the time constant of the TECS control algorithm when in final landing stage of flight. It should be smaller than TECS_TIME_CONST to allow for faster flare

param.humanName: Controller sink rate to pitch gain during flare
param.name: TECS_LAND_DAMP
param.documentation: This is the sink rate gain for the pitch demand loop when in final landing stage of flight. It should be larger than TECS_PTCH_DAMP to allow for better sink rate control during flare.

param.humanName: Maximum pitch during final stage of landing
param.name: TECS_LAND_PMAX
param.documentation: This limits the pitch used during the final stage of automatic landing. During the final landing stage most planes need to keep their pitch small to avoid stalling. A maximum of 10 degrees is usually good. A value of zero means to use the normal pitch limits.

param.humanName: Sink rate max for landing approach stage
param.name: TECS_APPR_SMAX
param.documentation: The sink rate max for the landing approach stage of landing. This will need to be large for steep landing approaches especially when using reverse thrust. If 0, then use TECS_SINK_MAX.

param.name: TECS_LAND_SRC
param.documentation: When zero, the flare sink rate (TECS_LAND_SINK) is a fixed sink demand. With this enabled the flare sinkrate will increase/decrease the flare sink demand as you get further beyond the LAND waypoint. Has no effect before the waypoint. This value is added to TECS_LAND_SINK proportional to distance traveled after wp. With an increasing sink rate you can still land in a given distance if you're traveling too fast and cruise passed the land point. A positive value will force the plane to land sooner proportional to distance passed land point. A negative number will tell the plane to slowly climb allowing for a pitched-up stall landing. Recommend 0.2 as initial value.

param.name: TECS_LAND_TDAMP
param.documentation: This is the damping gain for the throttle demand loop during and auto-landing. Same as TECS_THR_DAMP but only in effect during an auto-land. Increase to add damping to correct for oscillations in speed and height. When set to 0 landing throttle damp is controlled by TECS_THR_DAMP.

param.name: TECS_LAND_IGAIN
param.documentation: This is the integrator gain on the control loop during landing. When set to 0 then TECS_INTEG_GAIN is used. Increase to increase the rate at which speed and height offsets are trimmed out. Typically values lower than TECS_INTEG_GAIN work best

param.name: TECS_TKOFF_IGAIN
param.documentation: This is the integrator gain on the control loop during takeoff. When set to 0 then TECS_INTEG_GAIN is used. Increase to increase the rate at which speed and height offsets are trimmed out. Typically values higher than TECS_INTEG_GAIN work best

param.name: TECS_LAND_PDAMP
param.documentation: This is the damping gain for the pitch demand loop. Increase to add damping to correct for oscillations in speed and height. If set to 0 then TECS_PTCH_DAMP will be used instead.

param.name: MNT_DEFLT_MODE
param.documentation: Mount default operating mode on startup and after control is returned from autopilot

param.name: MNT_RETRACT_X

param.name: MNT_NEUTRAL_Z

param.documentation: 0 for none, any other for the RC channel to be used to control roll movements

param.name: MNT_ANGMIN_ROL
param.documentation: Minimum physical roll angular position of mount.

param.name: MNT_ANGMAX_ROL
param.documentation: Maximum physical roll angular position of the mount

param.name: MNT_RC_IN_TILT
param.documentation: 0 for none, any other for the RC channel to be used to control tilt (pitch) movements

param.name: MNT_ANGMIN_TIL
param.documentation: Minimum physical tilt (pitch) angular position of mount.

param.name: MNT_ANGMAX_TIL
param.documentation: Maximum physical tilt (pitch) angular position of the mount

param.name: MNT_RC_IN_PAN
param.documentation: 0 for none, any other for the RC channel to be used to control pan (yaw) movements

param.name: MNT_ANGMIN_PAN
param.documentation: Minimum physical pan (yaw) angular position of mount.

param.name: MNT_ANGMAX_PAN
param.documentation: Maximum physical pan (yaw) angular position of the mount

param.name: MNT_JSTICK_SPD
param.documentation: 0 for position control, small for low speeds, 100 for max speed. A good general value is 10 which gives a movement speed of 3 degrees per second.

param.name: MNT_LEAD_RLL
param.documentation: Causes the servo angle output to lead the current angle of the vehicle by some amount of time based on current angular rate, compensating for servo delay. Increase until the servo is responsive but doesn't overshoot. Does nothing with pan stabilization enabled.

param.name: MNT_LEAD_PTCH
param.documentation: Causes the servo angle output to lead the current angle of the vehicle by some amount of time based on current angular rate. Increase until the servo is responsive but doesn't overshoot. Does nothing with pan stabilization enabled.

param.name: MNT_TYPE
param.documentation: Mount Type (None, Servo or MAVLink)

param.name: LOG_BACKEND_TYPE
param.documentation: 0 for None, 1 for File, 2 for dataflash mavlink, 3 for both file and dataflash

param.humanName: Maximum DataFlash File Backend buffer size (in kilobytes)
param.name: LOG_FILE_BUFSIZE
param.documentation: The DataFlash_File backend uses a buffer to store data before writing to the block device. Raising this value may reduce "gaps" in your SD card logging. This buffer size may be reduced depending on available memory. PixHawk requires at least 4 kilobytes. Maximum value available here is 64 kilobytes.

param.name: LOG_DISARMED
param.documentation: If LOG_DISARMED is set to 1 then logging will be enabled while disarmed. This can make for very large logfiles but can help a lot when tracking down startup issues

param.humanName: Enable logging of information needed for Replay
param.name: LOG_REPLAY
param.documentation: If LOG_REPLAY is set to 1 then the EKF2 state estimator will log detailed information needed for diagnosing problems with the Kalman filter. It is suggested that you also raise LOG_FILE_BUFSIZE to give more buffer space for logging and use a high quality microSD card to ensure no sensor data is lost

param.name: BRD_PWM_COUNT
param.documentation: 控制FMU引脚分配到PWM输出，定时器捕获和GPIO。 所有未分配的引脚可用于GPIO

param.name: BRD_SER1_RTSCTS
param.documentation: 在Pixhawk上的串口1（数传1）上启用流量控制。 您必须将RTS和CTS引脚连接到发射端。 用于3DR无线电的标准DF13 6针连接器具有连接的那些引脚。 如果设置为2，则通过在启动时检查输出缓冲区填充来自动检测流量控制。 请注意，PX4v1在此端口上没有硬件流控制引脚，因此应将其禁用。

param.name: BRD_SER2_RTSCTS
param.documentation: 在Pixhawk和PX4上的串行2（数传2）上启用流量控制。 您必须将RTS和CTS引脚连接到收音机。 用于3DR无线电的标准DF13 6针连接器具有连接的那些引脚。 如果设置为2，则通过在启动时检查输出缓冲区填充来自动检测流量控制。

param.name: BRD_SAFETYENABLE
param.documentation: 禁用此选项将禁止在PX4上使用安全开关进行布防。 强烈建议使用安全开关，因此除非在特殊情况下，否则应将此选项设置为1。

param.name: BRD_SBUS_OUT
param.documentation: 这将以赫兹为单位设置SBUS输出帧速率

param.name: BRD_SERIAL_NUM
param.documentation: 用户自定义的机体序列号，它可以是任何你想要的任意数字，对飞控没有影响

param.name: BRD_CAN_ENABLE
param.documentation: 在Pixhawk上启用此选项可启用CAN设备。 注意，这使用大约25k的内存

param.humanName: 忽略安全开关状态的通道
param.name: BRD_SAFETY_MASK
param.documentation: 一个位掩码，用于控制在安全功能未被按下时其通道可以移动

libraries.parameters:
<param humanName=手动引脚" name="AFS_MAN_PIN" documentation="这将在手动模式下将数字输出引脚设置为高电平" user="Advanced">
这启用了高级故障安全系统。 如果设置为零（禁用），则所有其他AFS选项不起作用
meters
meters
millibar
seconds

param.name: FLOW_ENABLE
param.documentation: 将此设置为Enabled（1）将启用光流。 将此设置为禁用（0）将禁用光流

param.humanName: X轴光流量比例因子校正
param.name: FLOW_FXSCALER
param.documentation: 这设置了应用于流量传感器X轴光速的每千比例因子校正的分数。 它可以用于校正有效焦距的变化。 每增加1，增加应用于X轴光流读数的比例因子0.1％。 负值减小比例因子。

param.humanName: Y轴光流量比例因子校正
param.name: FLOW_FYSCALER
param.documentation: 这设置了应用于流量传感器Y轴光学速率的每千比例因子校正的分数。 它可以用于校正有效焦距的变化。 每增加1，增加应用于Y轴光流读数的比例因子0.1％。 负值减小比例因子。

param.name: FLOW_ORIENT_YAW
param.documentation: 指定光流传感器相对于机体偏航的厘米数。 其X轴指向机体X轴的右侧的传感器具有正偏航角。

param.name: MIS_TOTAL
param.documentation: 地面站装载的任务项目的数目。 请勿手动更改此设置。

param.humanName: 任务进入任务模式时重新启动
param.name: MIS_RESTART
param.documentation: 进入自动模式时控制任务起点（从任务开始重新开始或从上次命令运行恢复）

param.name: RALLY_TOTAL
param.documentation: 当前加载的集合点总数

param.name: RALLY_LIMIT_KM
param.documentation: 到集油点的最大距离。 如果最近的拉力点距离当前位置多于这个公里数，并且原位置比任何拉力点距当前位置更近，则将RTL设置为归位而不是最近的集合点。 这防止来自不同机场的剩余集合点被意外使用。 如果设置为0，则始终使用最近的集合点。

param.name: RALLY_INCL_HOME
param.documentation: 控制是否将家作为RTL的拉力点（即作为安全着陆位置）

param.name: EKF_ENABLE
param.documentation: 这使得EKF1在使用备用算法时被禁用。 禁用它时，必须通过设置EK2_ENABLED = 1启用备用EKF2估计器，并且必须通过设置AHRS_EKF_TYPE = 2将飞行控制算法设置为使用备用估计器。

param.humanName: GPS水平速度测量噪声定标器
param.name: EKF_VELNE_NOISE
param.documentation: 这是应用于由接收器报告的速度精度的缩放器，以估计水平速度观测噪声。 如果所使用的接收机的模型不提供速度精度估计，则假定速度精度为1。 增加它减少了对这些测量的权重。

param.humanName: GPS垂直速度测量噪声定标器
param.name: EKF_VELD_NOISE
param.documentation: 这是应用于由接收器报告的速度精度的缩放器，以估计垂直速度观测噪声。 如果所使用的接收机的模型不提供速度精度估计，则假定速度精度为1。 增加它减少了这个测量的权重。

param.name: EKF_POSNE_NOISE
param.documentation: 这是GPS水平位置测量中的噪声的RMS值。 增加它减少了对这些测量的权重。

param.name: EKF_ALT_NOISE
param.documentation: 这是高度测量中噪声的RMS值。 增加它减少了这个测量的权重。

param.name: EKF_MAG_NOISE
param.documentation: 这是磁力计测量中噪声的RMS值。 增加它减少了对这些测量的权重。

param.humanName: 等效空速测量噪声（米/秒）
param.name: EKF_EAS_NOISE
param.documentation: 这是等效空速测量中噪声的RMS值。 增加它减少了对这些测量的权重。

param.humanName: 风速过程噪声 （米/秒平方）
param.name: EKF_WIND_PNOISE
param.documentation: 这种噪声控制风状态误差估计的增长。 增加它使得风估计更快、更嘈杂。

param.humanName: 高度风速过程噪声定标器
param.name: EKF_WIND_PSCALE
param.documentation: 增加此参数增加了风状态在改变高度时适应的速度，但是确实使风速估计噪声增加。

param.name: EKF_GYRO_PNOISE
param.documentation: 该噪声控制由于陀螺仪测量误差（不包括偏置）导致的估计误差的增长。 增加它使得滤波器信任陀螺仪，使其测量更少，其他的测量更多。

param.humanName: 加速度计噪声（米/秒平方）
param.name: EKF_ACC_PNOISE
param.documentation: 该噪声控制由于不包括偏置的加速度计测量误差而导致的估计误差的增长。 增加它使得滤波器信任加速度计，使其测量更少，其他的测量更多。

param.humanName: 速率陀螺偏置过程噪声 (弧度/秒)
param.name: EKF_GBIAS_PNOISE
param.documentation: 这种噪声控制陀螺偏置状态误差估计的增长。 增加它使速率陀螺仪偏置估计更快和更嘈杂。

param.humanName: 加速度计偏置过程噪声（米/秒平方）
param.name: EKF_ABIAS_PNOISE
param.documentation: 该噪声控制垂直加速度计偏置状态误差估计的增长。 增加它使加速度计偏差估计更快和更嘈杂。

param.humanName: 地球磁场过程噪声 (高斯/秒)
param.name: EKF_MAGE_PNOISE
param.documentation: 这种噪声控制地球磁场状态误差估计的增长。 增加它使得地球磁场偏置估计更快和更嘈杂。

param.humanName: 体磁场过程噪声（高斯/秒）
param.name: EKF_MAGB_PNOISE
param.documentation: 这种噪声控制身体磁场状态误差估计的增长。 增加它使得罗盘偏移估计更快和更嘈杂。

param.name: EKF_VEL_DELAY
param.documentation: 这是GPS速度测量滞后于惯性测量的毫秒数。

param.name: EKF_POS_DELAY
param.documentation: 这是GPS位置测量滞后于惯性测量的毫秒数。

param.name: EKF_GPS_TYPE
param.documentation: 此参数控制GPS测量的使用：0 =使用3D速度和2D位置，1 =使用2D速度和2D位置，2 =使用2D位置，3 =不使用GPS（如果可用，将使用光流）

param.name: EKF_VEL_GATE
param.documentation: 此参数设置应用于GPS速度测量一致性检查的标准偏差数。 减少它使得更好的测量将被拒绝。 增加它使得更可能接受坏的测量值。

param.name: EKF_POS_GATE
param.documentation: 此参数设置应用于GPS位置测量一致性检查的标准偏差数。 减少它使得更好的测量将被拒绝。 增加它使得更可能接受坏的测量值。

param.name: EKF_HGT_GATE
param.documentation: 此参数设置应用于高度测量一致性检查的标准偏差数。 减少它使得更好的测量将被拒绝。 增加它使得更可能接受坏的测量值。

param.name: EKF_MAG_GATE
param.documentation: 此参数设置应用于磁力计测量一致性检查的标准偏差数。 减少它使得更好的测量将被拒绝。 增加它使得更可能接受坏的测量值。

param.name: EKF_EAS_GATE
param.documentation: 此参数设置应用于空速测量一致性检查的标准偏差数。 减少它使得更好的测量将被拒绝。 增加它使得更可能接受坏的测量值。

param.name: EKF_MAG_CAL
param.documentation: EKF_MAG_CAL = 0启用基于飞行速度和高度的校准，是飞机用户的默认设置。 EKF_MAG_CAL = 1启用基于操纵水平的校准，是直升机和旋翼用户的默认设置。 EKF_MAG_CAL = 2防止磁力计校准，无论飞行条件如何，如果飞行中磁力计校准不可靠，建议使用。

param.humanName: GPS跳变加速门限值(厘米/秒平方)
param.name: EKF_GLITCH_ACCEL
param.documentation: 该参数控制在拒绝GPS位置数据之前由滤波器预测的值与由GPS测量的值之间的水平加速度的最大量。 如果此值设置得太低，则有效的GPS数据将被定期丢弃，并且位置精度会降低。 如果此参数设置太高，则大的GPS跳变将导致位置的大的快速变化。

param.name: EKF_GLITCH_RAD
param.documentation: 该参数控制在长期毛刺保护逻辑被激活并且滤波器状态被重置为新的GPS位置之前，由滤波器预测的值与由GPS测量的值之间的水平位置（以m为单位）的最大量。 小于该值的位置步长将被暂时忽略，但将被接受，并且过滤器将移动到新位置。 大于此值的位置步长将最初被忽略，但滤波器将对GPS位置测量应用偏移。

param.name: EKF_GND_GRADIENT
param.documentation: 此参数设置地形高度估计采用的RMS地形梯度百分比。 地形高度可以使用光流和/或测距传感器数据（如果安装）估计。 较小的值会导致地形高度估计较慢地响应测量中的变化。 值越大，地形高度估计的响应速度越快，但噪声也越大。 通常，如果在非常平坦的地形上操作，则该值可以减小，并且如果在不平坦的地形上操作，则该值增加。

param.name: EKF_FLOW_NOISE
param.documentation: 这是噪声的RMS值和光流测量中的误差。 增加它减少了对这些测量的权重。

param.name: EKF_FLOW_GATE
param.documentation: 此参数设置应用于光流一致性检查的标准偏差数。 减少它使得更可能拒绝好的测量,增加它使得更可能接受坏的测量。

param.name: EKF_FLOW_DELAY
param.documentation: 这是光流测量滞后于惯性测量的毫秒数。 它是从光流平均周期结束时起的时间，并且不包括由于光流传感器内100毫秒平均的时间延迟。

param.name: EKF_RNG_GATE
param.documentation: 此参数设置应用于测距仪一致性检查的标准偏差数。 减少它使得更可能拒绝好的测量,增加它使得更可能接受坏的测量。

param.name: EKF_MAX_FLOW
param.documentation: 此参数设置将被滤波器接受的以弧度/秒为单位的幅度最大光流速率。

param.name: EKF_FALLBACK
param.documentation: 此参数控制触发回退到DCM和INAV所需的条件。 值为1将导致在丢失GPS和其他条件时发生回退。 值为0将更多地信任EKF。

param.name: EKF_ALT_SOURCE
param.documentation: 此参数控制在光流导航期间EKF使用哪个高度传感器（当EKF_GPS_TYPE = 3时）。 值为0将使其始终使用气压计高度。 值为1将导致它使用测距仪（如果可用）。

param.name: EKF_GPS_CHECK
param.documentation: 1字节掩码的GPS预检检查执行。 设置为0以绕过所有检查。 设置为255执行所有检查。 设置为3，仅检查卫星和HDoP的数量。 设置为31的最严格的检查，仍然允许检查通过时，多旋翼移动，例如从船上发射。
param.field: 0:NSats,1:HDoP,2:speed error,3:horiz pos error,4:yaw error,5:pos drift,6:vert speed,7:horiz speed

param.name: EK2_ENABLE
param.documentation: 启用EKF2。 启用EKF2只使数学计算，这并不意味着它将用于飞行控制。 要将其用于飞行控制组AHRS_EKF_TYPE = 2。 在更改EK2_ENABLE的值以使其生效后，需要重新启动。

param.name: EK2_GPS_TYPE
param.documentation: 控制GPS测量的使用：0 =使用3D速度和2D位置，1 =使用2D速度和2D位置，2 =使用2D位置，3 =不使用GPS（如果可用，将使用光流）

param.humanName: GPS水平速度测量噪声 (米/秒)
param.name: EK2_VELNE_M_NSE
param.documentation: 这设置了由用于设置水平速度观测噪声的GPS接收机报告的速度精度的下限。 如果使用的接收机的模型不提供速度精度估计，则将使用参数值。 增加它降低了GPS水平速度测量的权重。

param.humanName: GPS垂直速度测量噪声 (米/秒)
param.name: EK2_VELD_M_NSE
param.documentation: 这设置了由用于设置垂直速度观测噪声的GPS接收机报告的速度精度的下限。 如果使用的接收机的模型不提供速度精度估计，则将使用参数值。 增加它减少了GPS垂直速度测量的权重。

param.name: EK2_VEL_I_GATE
param.documentation: 这将设置应用于GPS速度测量一致性检查的标准差的百分比数。 减少它使得更可能拒绝好的测量,增加它使得更可能接受坏的测量。

param.name: EK2_POSNE_M_NSE
param.documentation: 这设置了GPS水平位置观测噪声。 增加它减少了GPS水平位置测量的权重。

param.name: EK2_POS_I_GATE
param.documentation: 这将设置应用于GPS位置测量一致性检查的标准差的百分比数。 减少它使得更可能拒绝好的测量,增加它使得更可能接受坏的测量。

param.name: EK2_GLITCH_RAD
param.documentation: 这控制了在过滤器位置和速度状态被重置为GPS之前由滤波器预测的值与由GPS测量的值之间的位置的最大径向不确定性。 使这个值更大允许过滤器忽略更大的GPS跳变，但也意味着非GPS错误，例如IMU和罗盘可以在过滤器被强制返回到GPS位置之前产生更大的位置误差。

param.name: EK2_GPS_DELAY
param.documentation: 这是GPS测量滞后于惯性测量的毫秒数。

param.name: EK2_ALT_SOURCE
param.documentation: 此参数控制EKF使用的高度传感器。 如果选择的选项n不能使用，它将默认为气压计作为主高度源。 设置0将始终使用气压计高度。 设置1使用测距仪，只能与光流导航（EK2_GPS_TYPE = 3）组合使用。 设置2使用GPS。

param.name: EK2_ALT_M_NSE
param.documentation: 这是高度测量中噪声的RMS值。 增加它减少了压力测量的权重，并将使滤波器对压力测量误差的响应更慢，但会使其对GPS和加速度计误差更为敏感。

param.name: EK2_HGT_I_GATE
param.documentation: 这将设置应用于高度测量创新一致性检查的标准偏差的百分比数。 减少它使得更可能拒绝好的测量,增加它使得更可能接受坏的测量。

param.humanName: 高度测量延迟时间 (毫秒)
param.name: EK2_HGT_DELAY
param.documentation: 这是高度测量滞后于惯性测量的毫秒数。

param.name: EK2_MAG_M_NSE
param.documentation: 这是磁力计测量中噪声的RMS值。 增加它减少了对这些测量的权重。

param.name: EK2_MAG_CAL
param.documentation: EKF_MAG_CAL = 0在机载时启用校准，是飞机用户的默认设置。 EKF_MAG_CAL = 1启用自动校准。 EKF_MAG_CAL = 2防止磁力计校准，无论飞行条件如何，建议如果外部磁场是变化的，是流动机的默认值。 EKF_MAG_CAL = 3在第一个空中场和偏航重置完成时启用校准，是旋翼机的默认值。 EKF_MAG_CAL = 4始终启用校准。 这决定了滤波器何时使用估计地球和人体固定磁场状态的3轴磁力计融合模型。 该模型仅适用于外部磁场环境稳定时使用。

values.value: 第一个爬升偏航重置之后

param.name: EK2_MAG_I_GATE
param.documentation: 这将设置应用于磁力计测量一致性检查的标准偏差的百分比数。 减少它使得更好的测量将被拒绝。 增加它使得更可能接受坏的测量。

param.humanName: 等效空速测量噪声（米/秒）
param.name: EK2_EAS_M_NSE
param.documentation: 这是飞机使用的等效空速测量中噪声的RMS值。 增加它减少了空速测量的权重，并将使风速估计更少噪声和更慢收敛。 在没有GPS测量的航位推算时，增加也增加了导航误差。

param.name: EK2_EAS_I_GATE
param.documentation: 这将设置应用于空速测量一致性检查的标准偏差的百分比数。 减少它使得更好的测量将被拒绝。 增加它使得更可能接受坏的测量。

param.name: EK2_RNG_M_NSE
param.documentation: 这是测距仪测量中噪声的RMS值。 增加它减少了这个测量的权重。

param.name: EK2_RNG_I_GATE
param.documentation: 这将设置应用于测距仪一致性检查的标准偏差的百分比数。 减少它使得更好的测量将被拒绝。 增加它使得更可能接受坏的测量。

param.name: EK2_MAX_FLOW
param.documentation: 这将设置将被滤波器接受的以弧度/秒为单位的幅度最大光流速率

param.name: EK2_FLOW_M_NSE
param.documentation: 这是噪声的RMS值和光流测量中的误差。 增加它减少了对这些测量的权重。

param.name: EK2_FLOW_I_GATE
param.documentation: 这设置了应用于光流一致性检查的标准偏差的百分比数。 减少它使得更好的测量将被拒绝。 增加它使得更可能接受坏的测量。

param.name: EK2_FLOW_DELAY
param.documentation: 这是光流测量滞后于惯性测量的毫秒数。 它是从光流平均周期结束时起的时间，并且不包括由于流量传感器内100msec平均的时间延迟。

param.humanName: 速率陀螺仪噪声（弧度/秒）
param.name: EK2_GYRO_P_NSE
param.documentation: 该控制干扰噪声控制由于不包括偏置的陀螺仪测量误差而导致的估计误差的增长。 增加它使得滤波器信任陀螺仪测量更少和其他测量更多。

param.humanName: 加速度计噪声（米/秒平方）
param.name: EK2_ACC_P_NSE
param.documentation: 该控制干扰噪声控制由于不包括偏置的加速度计测量误差而导致的估计误差的增长。 增加它使得滤波器信任加速度计测量更少和其他测量更多。

param.humanName: 速率陀螺仪偏置稳定性（弧度/秒平方）
param.name: EK2_GBIAS_P_NSE
param.documentation: 这种状态过程噪声控制陀螺角度偏差状态误差估计的增长。 增加它使速率陀螺仪偏置估计更快和更嘈杂。

param.humanName: 速率陀螺仪比例因子稳定性（1 / 秒）
param.name: EK2_GSCL_P_NSE
param.documentation: 该噪声控制陀螺仪比例因子学习的速率。 增加它使速率陀螺仪比例因子估计更快和更嘈杂。

param.humanName: 加速度计偏差稳定性（米 / 秒立方）
param.name: EK2_ABIAS_P_NSE
param.documentation: 该噪声控制垂直加速度计增量速度偏差状态误差估计的增长。 增加它使加速度计偏差估计更快和更嘈杂。

param.humanName: 磁场过程噪声（高斯/ 秒）
param.name: EK2_MAG_P_NSE
param.documentation: 这种状态过程噪声控制磁场状态误差估计的增长。 增加它使磁场偏置估计更快和更嘈杂。

param.humanName: 风速过程噪声（米 / 秒平方）
param.name: EK2_WIND_P_NSE
param.documentation: 这种状态过程噪声控制风状态误差估计的增长。 增加它使得风估计更快和更嘈杂。

param.humanName: 高度风速过程噪声定标器
param.name: EK2_WIND_PSCALE
param.documentation: 这控制了在获得或失去高度时考虑风速和方向随高度的变化，风状态下的过程噪声增加多少。 增加此参数增加了风状态在改变高度时适应的速度，但是会使风速估计噪声增加。

param.name: EK2_GPS_CHECK
param.documentation: 1字节掩码的GPS预检检查执行。 设置为0以绕过所有检查。 设置为255执行所有检查。 设置为3，仅检查卫星和HDoP的数量。 设置为31的最严格的检查，仍然允许检查通过时，多旋翼移动，例如从船上发射。
param.field: 0:NSats,1:HDoP,2:speed error,3:horiz pos error,4:yaw error,5:pos drift,6:vert speed,7:horiz speed

param.name: EK2_IMU_MASK
param.documentation: 1 byte bitmap of IMUs to use in EKF2. A separate instance of EKF2 will be started for each IMU selected. Set to 1 to use the first IMU only (default), set to 2 to use the second IMU only, set to 3 to use the first and second IMU. Additional IMU's can be used up to a maximum of 6 if memory and processing resources permit. There may be insufficient memory and processing resources to run multiple instances. If this occurs EKF2 will fail to start.

param.name: EK2_CHECK_SCALE
param.documentation: 缩放了用于在EKF使用GPS精度之前用于检查GPS精度的阈值。 值为100是默认值。 值大于100增加，值小于100减小EKF将接受的最大GPS误差。 值为200将允许的GPS误差加倍。

param.humanName: 非GPS操作位置不确定度（米）
param.name: EK2_NOAID_M_NSE
param.documentation: 这设置了在没有外部测量（例如GPS或光流）的情况下操作时EKF允许的位置变化量。 增加此参数使得EKF姿态估计对机体操纵不敏感，但对IMU误差更敏感。

param.name: EK2_LOG_MASK
param.documentation: 这将设置传感器的IMU掩码以进行完全日志记录

param.name: RPM_TYPE
param.documentation: 连接什么类型的RPM传感器

param.name: RPM_SCALING
param.documentation: 传感器读数和RPM之间的比例因子。

param.name: RPM_MAX
param.documentation: 要报告的最高RPM

param.name: RPM_MIN
param.documentation: 要报告的最低RPM

param.name: RPM_MIN_QUAL
param.documentation: 要使用的最低的数据质量

param.name: RPM2_TYPE
param.documentation: 连接什么类型的RPM传感器

param.name: RPM2_SCALING
param.documentation: 传感器读数和RPM之间的比例因子。

param.name: RSSI_TYPE
param.documentation: 无线电接收器RSSI类型。 如果您的无线电接收器支持某种类型的RSSI，请在此设置，然后设置其关联的RSSI_XXXXX参数（如果有）。

param.name: RSSI_ANA_PIN
param.documentation: 这将选择一个模拟引脚，将读取接收器RSSI电压。

param.name: RSSI_PIN_LOW
param.documentation: 这是当信号强度最弱时无线电接收机将置于RSSI_ANA_PIN上的电压值。 由于一些无线电接收器从您可能期望的输出反转的值，这不一定是比RSSI_PIN_HIGH低的值。

param.name: RSSI_PIN_HIGH
param.documentation: 这是当信号强度最强时无线电接收机将放在RSSI_ANA_PIN上的电压值。 由于一些无线电接收器从您可能期望的反转值，这不一定是比RSSI_PIN_LOW更高的值。

param.name: RSSI_CHANNEL
param.documentation: 无线电接收机将输出RSSI的信道号（5及以上）。

param.name: RSSI_CHAN_LOW
param.documentation: 这是当信号强度最弱时无线电接收机将置于RSSI_CHANNEL上的PWM值。 由于一些无线电接收器输出与您可能期望的值相反的值，因此这不一定是比RSSI_CHAN_HIGH低的值。

param.name: RSSI_CHAN_HIGH
param.documentation: 这是当信号强度最强时无线电接收机将置于RSSI_CHANNEL上的PWM值。 由于一些无线电接收器从您可能期望的反转值，这不一定是比RSSI_CHAN_LOW更高的值。

param.name: NTF_LED_BRIGHT
param.documentation: 选择RGB LED亮度级别。 当连接USB时，无论设置如何，亮度永远不会高于低值。

param.name: NTF_BUZZ_ENABLE
param.documentation: 启用或禁用蜂鸣器。 仅适用于基于Linux和PX4的板。

param.name: EPM_ENABLE
param.documentation: EPM启用/禁用

param.name: EPM_GRAB
param.documentation: PWM值发送到EPM以启动抓取货物。

param.name: EPM_RELEASE
param.documentation: PWM值发送到EPM以释放货物。

param.name: EPM_NEUTRAL
param.documentation: 不捕获或释放时将PWM值发送到EPM。

param.name: EPM_REGRAB
param.documentation: 以秒为单位的时间，抓爪将抓住货物，以确保抓地力没有减弱

param.name: LGR_SERVO_RTRACT
param.documentation: 起落架收起时的伺服PWM值

param.name: LGR_SERVO_DEPLOY
param.documentation: 起落架部署时的伺服PWM值

param.name: IM_STAB_COL_1
param.documentation: 直升机在稳定模式下零油门输入时的最小俯仰设置

param.name: IM_STAB_COL_2
param.documentation: 在稳定模式下，中低油门输入时，直升机的俯仰设置

param.name: IM_STAB_COL_3
param.documentation: 在稳定模式下，直升机在中高油门输入时的俯仰设置

param.name: IM_STAB_COL_4
param.documentation: 在稳定模式下，全油门输入时的直升机最大俯仰设置

param.name: IM_ACRO_COL_EXP
param.documentation: 特技模式下中心点附近的用于柔化俯仰输入。

param.name: WPNAV_SPEED
param.documentation: 定义飞行器在航点任务期间将尝试保持的水平速度（厘米 / 秒）

param.name: WPNAV_RADIUS
param.documentation: 定义距离航点的距离，当交叉点表示已经抵达航点。

param.name: WPNAV_SPEED_UP
param.documentation: 定义飞行器在航点任务期间在攀爬期间将尝试保持的速度（厘米 / 秒）

param.name: WPNAV_SPEED_DN
param.documentation: 定义飞行器在航点任务期间下降期间将尝试保持的速度（厘米 / 秒）

param.name: WPNAV_LOIT_SPEED
param.documentation: 定义飞行器在滞留模式下水平行进的最大速度（厘米 / 秒）

param.name: WPNAV_ACCEL
param.documentation: 定义任务期间使用的水平加速度（厘米 / 秒平方）

param.name: WPNAV_ACCEL_Z
param.documentation: 定义任务期间使用的垂直加速度（cm / s / s）

param.humanName: Loiter最大抖动，单位cm / s / s / s
param.name: WPNAV_LOIT_JERK
param.documentation: Loiter最大抖动，单位cm / s / s / s

param.name: WPNAV_LOIT_MAXA
param.documentation: Loiter最大加速度，单位cm / s / s。 更高的值会使直升机加速和停止更快.

param.name: WPNAV_LOIT_MINA
param.documentation: Loiter最小加速度，单位cm / s / s。 较高的值在遥控杆对中时更快地停止直升机，但当直升机停止时会产生较大的抖动.

param.name: CIRCLE_RADIUS
param.documentation: 定义在绕圈飞行模式下飞行器飞行的圆的半径

param.name: CIRCLE_RATE
param.documentation: 绕圈模式的转动速率，单位为度/秒。 顺时针旋转为正，逆时针旋转为负

param.name: ATC_SLEW_YAW
param.documentation: 最大速率可以在Loiter，RTL，自动飞行模式下更新偏航目标

param.name: ATC_ACCEL_Y_MAX
param.documentation: 偏航轴的最大加速度

param.name: ATC_RATE_FF_ENAB
param.documentation: 控制是否启用或禁用主体帧速率前馈

param.name: ATC_ACCEL_R_MAX
param.documentation: 横滚轴的最大加速度

param.name: ATC_ACCEL_P_MAX
param.documentation: 俯仰轴最大加速度

param.name: ATC_ANGLE_BOOST
param.documentation: 当飞行器倾斜以减少高度损失时，角度加速增加输出油门

param.name: ATC_ANG_RLL_P
param.documentation: 横滚角度控制器P增益。 将所需滚动角和实际角度之间的误差转换为所需滚动速率

param.humanName: 俯仰轴角度控制器P增益
param.name: ATC_ANG_PIT_P
param.documentation: 俯仰轴角度控制器P增益。 将所需俯仰角和实际角度之间的误差转换为所需俯仰角速率

param.humanName: 偏航轴角度控制器P增益
param.name: ATC_ANG_YAW_P
param.documentation: 偏航轴角度控制器P增益。 将期望的偏航角和实际角度之间的误差转换为期望的偏航率

param.humanName: 角度限制（保持高度）时间常数
param.name: ATC_ANG_LIM_TC
param.documentation: 角度限制（保持高度）时间常数

param.humanName: 横滚轴速率控制器P增益
param.name: ATC_RAT_RLL_P
param.documentation: 横滚轴速率控制器P增益。 将所需滚动速率和实际滚动速率之间的差转换为电动机速度输出

param.name: ATC_RAT_RLL_I
param.documentation: 横滚速率控制器I增益。 纠正所需滚动速率与实际滚动速率的长期差异

param.humanName: 横滚轴速率控制器I获得最大值
param.name: ATC_RAT_RLL_IMAX
param.documentation: 横滚轴速率控制器I获得最大值。 限制I增益将输出的最大电机输出

param.humanName: 横滚轴速率控制器D增益
param.name: ATC_RAT_RLL_D
param.documentation: 横滚轴速率控制器D增益。 补偿所需转速与实际转速的短期变化

param.humanName: 横滚轴速率控制器输入频率（Hz）
param.name: ATC_RAT_RLL_FILT
param.documentation: 横滚轴速率控制器输入频率（Hz）

param.humanName: 俯仰轴速率控制器P增益
param.name: ATC_RAT_PIT_P
param.documentation: 俯仰轴速率控制器P增益。 将所需俯仰速率和实际俯仰速率之间的差转换为电机速度输出

param.humanName: 俯仰轴速率控制器I增益
param.name: ATC_RAT_PIT_I
param.documentation: 俯仰轴速率控制器I增益。 纠正期望俯仰速率与实际俯仰速率的长期差异

param.humanName: 俯仰轴速率控制器I获得最大值
param.name: ATC_RAT_PIT_IMAX
param.documentation: 俯仰轴速率控制器I获得最大值。 限制I增益将输出的最大电机输出

param.humanName: 俯仰轴速率控制器D增益
param.name: ATC_RAT_PIT_D
param.documentation: 俯仰轴速率控制器D增益。 补偿所需俯仰速率与实际俯仰速率的短期变化

param.humanName: 仰俯轴速率控制器输入频率（Hz）
param.name: ATC_RAT_PIT_FILT
param.documentation: 仰俯轴速率控制器输入频率（Hz）

param.humanName: 偏航轴速率控制器P增益
param.name: ATC_RAT_YAW_P
param.documentation: 偏航轴速率控制器P增益。 将所需偏航率和实际偏航率之间的差转换为电机速度输出

param.humanName: 偏航轴速率控制器I增益
param.name: ATC_RAT_YAW_I
param.documentation: 偏航轴速率控制器I增益。 修正所需偏航角速度与实际偏航角速度的长期差异

param.humanName: 偏航轴速率控制器I增益最大
param.name: ATC_RAT_YAW_IMAX
param.documentation: 偏航轴速率控制器I增益最大。 限制I增益将输出的最大电机输出

param.humanName: 偏航轴速率控制器D增益
param.name: ATC_RAT_YAW_D
param.documentation: 偏航轴速率控制器D增益。 补偿所需横摆角速度与实际横摆角速度的短期变化

param.name: ATC_THR_MIX_MIN
param.documentation: 油门与着陆时使用的姿态控制优先级（更高的值意味着我们优先考虑油门的姿态控制）

param.name: ATC_THR_MIX_MAX
param.documentation: 飞行期间主动使用的油门与姿态控制优先级（更高的值意味着我们优先考虑节气门的姿态控制）

param.name: POSCON__ACC_XY_FILT
param.documentation: 较低的值将减慢导航控制器的响应并减少抽搐

param.documentation: 允许您启用（1）或禁用（0）喷涂机

param.name: SPRAY_PUMP_RATE

param.documentation: 微调器的PWM转速（较高的速率将在较宽的水平面上分散喷雾）

param.name: SPRAY_SPEED_MIN
param.documentation: 我们将开始喷涂的速度最小值

param.name: SPRAY_PUMP_MIN
param.documentation: 最小泵速以百分比表示

param.documentation: 允许您启用（1）或禁用（0）防护功能

param.name: FENCE_TYPE
param.documentation: 启用的栅栏类型保持为位掩码

param.name: FENCE_ACTION
param.documentation: 当闯入围栏时应采取什么行动

param.name: FENCE_ALT_MAX
param.documentation: 地理围栏触发前允许的最大高度

param.name: FENCE_RADIUS
param.documentation: 圆形栅栏半径，当闯入时会导致RTL

param.name: FENCE_MARGIN
param.documentation: 自动驾驶仪应该与围栏保持距离，以避免违规

param.humanName: 避免控制 启用/禁用
param.name: AVOID_ENABLE

param.documentation: 斜盘伺服＃2的角度位置

param.name: H_SV3_POS
param.documentation: 斜盘伺服＃3的角度位置

param.name: H_TAIL_TYPE
param.documentation: 尾翼类型选择。 如果选择外部陀螺仪，则使用更简单的偏航控制器

param.name: H_SWASH_TYPE
param.documentation: 斜盘类型设置 - 包括 3-servo CCPM 或 H1 Mechanical Mixing

param.name: H_GYR_GAIN
param.documentation: 当尾翼为Servo w / ExtGyro 时，PWM发送到ch7的外部陀螺仪

param.humanName: 旋转倾转盘相位角补偿
param.name: H_PHANG

param.name: H_COLYAW
param.documentation: 前馈补偿，以在总距增加时自动添加方向舵输入。 可以是正或负取决于力学。

param.name: H_FLYBAR_MODE
param.documentation: Flybar是否存在。影响ACRO飞行模式期间使用的姿态控制器

param.name: H_TAIL_SPEED
param.documentation: 直接驱动VarPitch尾翼ESC速度。 仅当TailType为DirectDrive VarPitch时使用

param.name: H_GYR_GAIN_ACRO
param.documentation: 当尾翼为Servo w / ExtGyro 时，PWM发送到ch7的外部陀螺仪。 值为零表示使用H_GYR_GAIN

param.name: H_RSC_PWM_MIN

param.name: H_RSC_PWM_REV
param.documentation: 控制RSC通道输出的反转
